programme.title: JAG: Scimitar
programme.desc: Two Marines in a Humvee mistakenly drive into Iraq; an Iraqi detail intercepts them, kills one, and captures the other.

programme.title: JAG: Defensive Action
programme.desc: A patrolling F-14 malfunctions in a no-fly zone; the crew ejects, and the bird explodes.

programme.title: JAG: Boot.
programme.desc: A woman Marine recruit dies at Parris Island. Harm investigates while Meg poses undercover as a recruit.

programme.title: JAG: The Brotherhood
programme.desc: During a landing exercise Marines find a beaten, comatose fellow Marine on the beach.

programme.title: JAG: Hemlock
programme.desc: By mistake a foreign agent sends a fax to Meg's office; then he retrieves it and shoots Meg to prevent her from identifying him.

programme.title: JAG: Prisoner
programme.desc: Chicom agents capture Harm in Hong Kong; they vigorously question him in mainland China about official matters.

programme.title: JAG: Ares
programme.desc: Someone kills a Naval officer on Okinawa, then his ship encounters major trouble during war games at sea.

programme.title: JAG: Skeleton Crew
programme.desc: The body of a woman Naval officer, a friend, and classmate of Harm, is found ashore.

programme.title: JAG: Trinity
programme.desc: Harm and his new partner, Marine Major Sara MacKenzie are drawn into a game of revenge when they're sent to Belfast, Ireland, to represent the legal interests of a Navy Lieutenant whose infant son has seemingly been abducted.

programme.title: JAG: Secrets
programme.desc: Admiral Chegwidden, Mac and Bud Roberts are taken hostage in the Admiral's office by Pvt. Magida, a Marine who escaped from a nearby Federal prison.

programme.title: JAG: Ghosts
programme.desc: Harm and Mac investigate an attempt on Admiral Chedwiggen's life and uncover the fact that all the members of his former SEAL team have died under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: JAG: Full Engagement
programme.desc: While on their day off, Harm takes Mac for a flight in his vintage airplane, only to be forced to make an emergency landing in a mountain clearing because of mechanical problems.

programme.title: JAG: Cowboys and Cossaks
programme.desc: Harm, Mac, and Bud are assigned sea duty to monitor a joint war games exercise between U.S. and Russian naval forces.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Fast & The Nerdiest
programme.desc: After Sylvester scores big on THE PRICE IS RIGHT, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a high-end car smuggling operation about to ship bioweapons to South America.

programme.title: Scorpion: Ticker
programme.desc: When Los Angeles' blood supply is hacked and deemed unusable because of fear it's been tainted, Team Scorpion must find the culprit.

programme.title: Scorpion: Djibouti Call
programme.desc: While on a secret mission in Djibouti, Africa, with his new Homeland protege, Tim Armstrong (Scott Porter), Cabe is captured and Team Scorpion must save him.

programme.title: Scorpion: Twist And Shout
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's mission to recover the remains of fallen Marines in Vietnam is threatened along with their lives when a deadly tornado heads directly towards them.

programme.title: Scorpion: Hard Knox
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is hired by the Department of Defense to break into Fort Knox and "steal" a precious artifact in order to test their security.

programme.title: Scorpion: Chernobyl Intentions
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes to Chernobyl to repair the decaying nuclear reactor before a catastrophic meltdown.

programme.title: Scorpion: Plight At The Museum
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's simple job at the Los Angeles Natural History Museum turns deadly when they discover thieves robbing a rare gem exhibit in order to get materials needed to enrich a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Scorpion: Bat Poop Crazy
programme.desc: Before Halloween, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a deep, vast cave system in order to prevent a bat population from destroying the North America ecosystem.

programme.title: Scorpion: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.sub-title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.desc: On Election Day, as democracy hangs in the balance, Team Scorpion is called on when someone tries to throw the U.S. presidential election into chaos.

programme.title: Scorpion: Sly And The Family Stone
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion travels to Ireland for Megan's one-year memorial, Walter discovers that a nearby lake's natural disaster has created a poisonous cloud that could kill everyone in the village.

programme.title: Scorpion: Mother Load
programme.desc: Paige's estranged mother calls on Team Scorpion when she accidentally uncovers a forgotten nuclear reactor on the verge of exploding.

programme.title: Scorpion: This Is The Pits
programme.desc: Walter must swim through the deadly La Brea Tar Pits when Team Scorpion helps a woman trapped in the tar before she runs out of oxygen.

programme.title: Scorpion: Wreck The Halls
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Team Scorpion's electronics-free mountain getaway turns deadly when they come across gun-runners, and Ralph is kidnapped when they try to escape.

programme.title: Scorpion: Ice Ca-Cabes
programme.desc: When a mission in the desert results in exploding shrapnel that seriously wounds Cabe, Team Scorpion must freeze his body in order to save his life.

programme.title: Scorpion: Faux Money Maux Problems
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion is duped into producing counterfeit money for a foreign entity intent on ruining the U.S. economy, Paige must rely on her mother Veronica's skills as a grifter to save them.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: I Never
programme.desc: When a violent child abductor escapes from an emergency hospital visit, 15 Division goes on the hunt for the criminal -- only to discover that heʼs taken another young victim.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Surprises
programme.desc: After six months working undercover, Andy and Nick’s operation goes sideways when Nick, then Andy go missing. Meanwhile, a random arrest at 15 Division puts Sam Swarek and the other officers in the middle of the investigation-turned-rescue-mission.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Homecoming
programme.desc: On her first day back at 15 Division, Andy must work with Swarek to track down an ex convict determined to get his old life back at any cost. Andy realizes just how much has changed since she walked away from her old life six months ago.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deception
programme.desc: When a suspected pedophile is found beaten within an inch of his life, Andy discovers Marlo has been conducting a mania-fueled, off-hours “investigation”.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Under Fire
programme.desc: After Andy and Chloe take fire from an unseen shooter, the officers realize they are the targets of someone with a grudge against 15 Division.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: You Can See the Stars
programme.desc: In the wake of a targeted attack on the officers of 15 Division (ep. 412), Andy, Swarek, and their fellow officers have to piece together the truth about a past crime in order to find Oliver Shaw – in time to save his life.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
programme.sub-title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
programme.desc: When a mysterious young girl vanishes from the scene of a multi-car accident, Andy McNally connects the girl to a 7-year-old cold case.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Class Dismissed
programme.desc: As local high schools wind to a close for summer, dangerous pranks abound – including the theft of an armed police car. While tracking down the stolen vehicle, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a volatile teen boy.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Good Shoot
programme.desc: Dov Epstein happens upon a convenience store robbery-in-progress that results in him shooting a young black teenager.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Girl’s Night Out
programme.desc: On Traciʼs first day as a detective, all hell breaks loose when a carload of girls from a bachelorette party hits another vehicle, killing the driver. Jerry discovers that the driver of the parked car was dead before the accident.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Messy Houses
programme.desc: While answering a domestic disturbance call, Andyʼs personal life is turned inside out when the social worker on the scene turns out to be her estranged mother.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Coming Home
programme.desc: A noise complaint leads Andy and Swarek to an illegal warehouse party, and to an injured John Doe -- a homeless squatter whoʼs been stabbed in the warehouse.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 2
programme.desc: Yvette heads to Tamworth and a beautiful manor house that is said to be filled with\nparanormal occurrences. Almost as soon as the team get there something seems to want to\nmake itself known with dramatic effect.

programme.title: Ancient High House
programme.desc: The team are followed around this ancient house said to be the haunt of many long dead spirits. The team are soon put to the test as Gregg feels something is playing with him.

programme.title: Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 1
programme.desc: The Most Haunted tackle the deserted sprawling Ashwell Prison in this As-Live uncut episode. Feeling isolated and separated the team find themselves confronted by something in the dark.

programme.title: Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 2
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team continue to film at Ashwell Prison after being pushed to the limits tempers fray and Yvette is stuck alone, petrified as she is stalked by an unseen force lost in the corridors of the prison and the team scramble to save her.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and team are put to the test as activity seems to be all around them, something is following them but who or what. Could it be the spirit of a man they connect who died near the house over 100 years ago?

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and team are put to the test as activity seems to be all around them, something is following them but who or what. Could it be the spirit of a man they connect who died near the house over 100 years ago?

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 3

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads Most Haunted to Accrington's old police station and courts, housing playful spirits and malevolent entities. Is the evil too much for the team?

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT2
programme.desc: The second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation at the now-abandoned old police station and courts in Accrington. With the team splitting up to cover as much space as they can, something seems to be stalking them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT3
programme.desc: The third and final part of this terrifying and intriguing investigation into the paranormal activity at Accrington’s Old Police Station and Courts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding is back with the first part of a brand-new episode of Most Haunted. The intrepid ghost hunter has taken her team to the historic hall, which is said to be haunted by ancestral ghosts, the apparition of a white lady and a demon dog.

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt2
programme.desc: Watch the second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation of a historic hall, where the paranormal activity includes the disembodied sounds of children laughing and crying and the apparition of a white lady.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead & Breakfast

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.123

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.4

programme.desc: An attempt to serve divorce papers to a man and his new girlfriend allegedly ends in an act of vandalism and assault.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.186
programme.desc: A young man denies killing a teen's dog during their graduation party. Intoxicated teenagers prompt neighbors to call police, leading to a dispute over a broken apartment lease between feuding ex-roommates.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.241
programme.desc: A man describes his relationship as "friends with benefits" with a woman who claims she lent him money for living expenses. A woman sues her former live-in boyfriend for home renovation costs and furniture expenses.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.84
programme.desc: A contract between cousins to ‘share’ a Pontiac Grand Am ends with a fight over the return of the car with allegedly ‘missing’ speakers/A fight over a three-way gym membership leaves a young woman at odds with her ex-boyfriend and his best friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.178
programme.desc: Two women fight at a Halloween party over wearing the same costume, disputing their relationship with the Sheriff’s department. A woman crashes her co-worker's car into oncoming traffic, admitting she was driving without a license.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.137

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.79

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The arrival of three special guests, including David Beckham, raises the pressure during service. In the team challenge the chefs must roll dice with letters on them, choosing ingredients starting with the letters they roll.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams submit to the annual blind taste test challenge. The winners spend a day at a water park while the losers make deliveries, grind peppercorn, change the oil in the fryers and peel potatoes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs create their own menus in the toughest challenge yet, chef Ramsay relies on diner comment cards for his brutally honest criticism.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Spurred on by a gospel choir serenade, the contestants must find inspiration from the American Deep South for a Southern-style menu.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams have to prepare three dishes of Chef Ramsay's choosing, taking it in turns to complete the dish. One team feels the heat during service and needs help from their rivals to get the food out.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Twenty aspiring restaurateurs present their signature dishes to Ramsay -- and an audience -- in Las Vegas; while the challenge winners earn a night out on the town, the losers must head back to Los Angeles on a school bus.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants arrive at the dorms; Ramsay sends contestants out of the kitchen after a rocky first dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Olympic athletes Maurice Greene, Natalie Coughlin and Danell Leyva help Ramsay lead a 3K race, with the red and blue teams racing to prepare lunch for the runners; communication issues lead to fights during the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must identify the type of protein used in five dishes; as the winning team enjoys its victory at a beach house, the losing team must grind and mill grains to make bread from scratch; contestants are grilled during elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay makes a decision that changes the competition; two chefs work as servers during the dinner service; each team nominates two contestants to be put up for elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Martin Yan judges six Chinese dishes created by the remaining contestants; during dinner service, one team disappoints a VIP guest; a contestant is eliminated.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants enter an animal pen to determine which type of protein they will cook in the team challenge; during dinner service, the contestants must impress chef Ramsay's family.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt & Froy Auto Recovery
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia make their way to a home in the hills to clean a germaphobe of his car. Then, it's Matt and Froy's big repo. Having left the company to start their own, they head out after a high-end exotic car from outside a mansion.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Win Some, Quarrelsome, Lose Some
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia have an order for a Jaguar behind a retail outlet center, but will the loaders let their precious car be loaded up without a fight? Then, Matt and Froy find themselves amidst a lover's quarrel.

programme.title: Operation Repo: We Weren't Informed
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy end up on one of the weirdest repos they've ever encountered when a white cargo van unleashes a wave of workers. Then, Lou, Sonia, and Rob go green when they find they learn the Mercedes Benz they are after has been converted.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tijuana Surprise
programme.desc: Matt and Froy's business hits another snag when a gang of bat-wielding partiers keeps them away from a car and a paycheck. Then, Lou and Sonia wind up in the crosshairs when they attempt to repo a car from a man who appears to be a federal agent.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Lyndah's Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy continue their risky run in Tijuana, confronting a strip club owner who keeps a tight grip on his vehicle and his employees. Then, Lou and Cousin Rob are in a case of he said- she said when a seductive young debtor calls in the police.

programme.title: Operation Repo: El Prisionero
programme.desc: Lou and his cousin Rob face trouble on the job when a debtor makes shocking claims to police about the newest member of the Pizarro clan. Plus, will a repossession from a well-connected socialite end with Matt and Froy riding into the sunset?

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Showdown
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for a typical vehicle repossession.

programme.title: Operation Repo: What the Truck?!?
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for typical vehicle repossession...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Contact
programme.desc: The repo team is back! On the premiere episode of the summer season of Operation Repo, Lou, Matt, Sonia, Froy, and Lyndah are back together and better than ever...although a secret meeting suggests trouble in paradise. This week, the team confronts...

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Crush
programme.desc: Lou faces the toughest loss of his career. First, the team repossesses a truck from a pair of larger-than-life debtors with a passion for exotic sports, then they grapple with a gaggle of drunken partiers who don't want to give up their tricked-out bus.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Daddy's Little Girl
programme.desc: The destruction of the repo team's truck has left the future of the company in the balance, but Matt's got a trick up his sleeve that might keep them afloat. Lou and Sonia head to a dark alley to take a van away from a pair of libidinous teens.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Junior Partner
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hard Turns Ahead
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride, Matt and Lyndah attempt to repo..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: The confusion over Lou's new business relationship with Matt continues to mount. Matt and Froy find themselves in a nice neighborhood on a mission to repossess a security car from the world's most bumbling guards, Sonia, Lyndah, and Matt hit the docks.

programme.title: Operation Repo: New Truck Day
programme.desc: The repo team's new truck finally arrives, and with it, a new chapter in the building feud between Team Lou and Team Matt.

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Blow to the Head
programme.desc: When Froy is seriously injured on a routine repo, the building confrontation between Lou and Matt continues to escalate.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay
programme.desc: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about 'art'. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey find themselves enjoying alternative forms of entertainment.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share
programme.desc: Jeff makes plans to take Audrey away for the weekend to a fancy hotel, even though they’ll have to sit through a time share presentation to get a great deal.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male
programme.desc: Jeff's drive to be labeled an 'optimal male' on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior, while Adam's over-friendliness with an ex-girlfriend unsettles Jennifer.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Four Pillars
programme.desc: To make Audrey happy, Jeff begrudgingly agrees to see a couple's therapist. Meanwhile, Russell develops a crush on Timmy's fiancé.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Ghost Story
programme.desc: Audrey is upset when Jeff reveals to her that he does not believe she saw her dead grandmother's ghost. Meanwhile, Russell tries to persuade Timmy not to go through with his arranged marriage.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Indian Giver
programme.desc: Audrey is surprised by Jeff's sudden interest in her favorite reality show until she discovers the reason. Meanwhile, to Russell's delight, Timmy has second thoughts about his impending arranged marriage.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 3rd Wheel
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to Jeff, Audrey lies to her homely friend Liz that she is on Jeff's list of women he would sleep with if Audrey were not around.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Snoozin' For A Bruisin'
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey switch sides of the bed, Jeff accidentally rolls over and clocks Audrey in the face, landing her in the hospital.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Reunion
programme.desc: Audrey attends her high school reunion intent on proving to her former classmates how great her life is in New York City. Meanwhile, Russell accidentally ruins Timmy's dinner party.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Free Free Time
programme.desc: When Audrey's weekly girls' night out is canceled, Jeff seeks out time alone; however, his plans are foiled every step of the way. Meanwhile, Russell discovers that Timmy has a lot of pent-up aggression toward him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Score
programme.desc: Jeff spends the evening trying to avoid learning the score of a Rangers game after Audrey forces him to give up his tickets and go to her boss' party instead. Meanwhile, at the game, Russell is mortified when Timmy roots against the home team.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Atlantic City
programme.desc: Audrey tries to make Jeff feel guilty for not telling her that his friend's bachelor party in Atlantic City was canceled; however, her plan backfires when Jeff discovers that Audrey is also being deceitful.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Harassment
programme.desc: A new employee with an axe to grind against Audrey files a sexual harassment claim against her. Meanwhile, after being teased for playing cricket, Timmy challenges Jeff to a game to prove the sport is not for wimps.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Surrogate
programme.desc: An overly enthusiastic Audrey pushes it too far with a surrogate mother who she and Jeff are considering paying to have their baby. Meanwhile, Russell shamelessly pokes fun at Jennifer and Adam's wedding Web site.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: They Do?
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer plan a secret wedding; however, a series of unfortunate events puts their plan in jeopardy. Meanwhile, to keep Russell and Timmy from finding out about the ceremony, Adam tells them he is staging an intervention for Jeff.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rug-of-War
programme.desc: Upset that he'll have to purchase a new rug after Audrey gives their old one to Adam and Jenn, Jeff tries to sabotage the gift by telling Adam about all the 'fun' that he and Audrey had on it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Bank
programme.desc: When Jeff screws up paying for Audrey's Pilates classes, he reveals to Adam that he has a 'Bank' of mistakes that she has incurred that he uses to ease her anger. Russell sends an email to Timmy's crush.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Surro-Gate
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey discover surprising news about their surrogate.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Handy Man
programme.desc: When Audrey realizes Jeff is getting a bit bored in the bedroom, she tries to spice it up. Russell gets called out on a business trip, but has a fear of flying. He invites Timmy to distract him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Play Ball
programme.desc: Audrey considers quitting her job when she realizes it's making her life miserable. Although things are heated between Allison and Timmy, she wants to put their sex life aside so they can spend time getting to know each other.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Match Point
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known addresses.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Scared Straight
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gangsta in time to convince him to make the right choice?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All My Children
programme.desc: For a guy who started life as a free spirited outlaw-biker Dog has certainly turned into a family man. His children touch everything he does today, from searching for the perfect gift for his daughter Cecily's birthday to hunting a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: The hunt for an elusive and clever criminal takes Dog through the world of a bantam fighting cock, a pregnant daughter, and a jungle safe house go together. And don't forget the mopeds as well as a group of hostile squatters on government land!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Power
programme.desc: When Dog decides to spend the day caring for his newest granddaughter, Beth enlists the girls to hunt down a female fugitive. Heading into a dangerous part of town the ladies will use their feminine wiles to track this mother gone wrong.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Ties
programme.desc: Dog doesn't have the whole team today and he's got to catch a fugitive with a record of criminal assault. But when Dog finds the fugitive's former girlfriend, she thinks he isn't dangerous at all.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Special Delivery
programme.desc: For months, this fugitive has been stringing Leland along with a series of barely believable excuses. Out of patience, Leland calls in the Big Dog. The whole team heads out to put pressure on the family and friends of the fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surface Scratches
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Great Debate
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Facebooked
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But unfortunately they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mano-a-Mano
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.sub-title: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Razing the Snakes
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of cottonmouth snakes on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Willie uses his business expertise to help Rebecca improve her clothing store.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead. Jase and the guys are inspired to design a product using zip lines that will revolutionize duck hunting.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Willie Hunting
programme.desc: While many of the guys' wives and children are in Africa doing charity work, Willie and Jase get into a debate over tracking ability which leads to a challenge--can Jase and Si track and capture Willie and Jep?

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sleep Cover
programme.desc: With Korie still in Africa, Willie and Jep must step in and supervise Bella's sleepover. When a couple boys play a prank on the girls, Willie and Jep prove to be the perfect chaperones for the task.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drive-In Revivin'
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture without spending any money. Missy and Jase compete to see who can find a girlfriend for Mountain Man.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fishful Thinking
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.

programme.title: Target Earth
programme.desc: When aliens have infiltrated society by inhabiting bodies of select human beings, they plan a full-scale invasion of Earth. A detective finds the information that can stop the attack; however the information is in the mind of a six-year-old child.

programme.title: The Four Warriors
programme.desc: Travelling home, four soldiers discover a village gripped by fear, as residents are abducted by unknown predators. These warriors set out to rescue them and destroy what lurks outside the village.

programme.title: Monster Hunters
programme.desc: When an alien prison ship crash lands and unleashes creature after creature in the California desert, they make quick work of the army that tries to stop them.

programme.title: Space Truckers
programme.desc: A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.

programme.title: Minotaur: Minotaur
programme.desc: When the villagers offer their brethren as a sacrifice to the Minotaur, Theo (Tom Hardy) sets off on a harrowing quest to the labyrinth to kill the evil bull-god.

programme.title: Rise Of The Fellowship
programme.desc: What if The Lord of the Rings wasn’t just a story? What if it happened to you? Randall Dooley and his friends are outcasts at school, spending most of their time playing online games. After Randall is set up for a crime he didn’t commit.

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: Relative Values
programme.desc: When a star and Hollywood Diva Miranda Frayle brek up, a playboy prince with a stiff upper lip sweeps her off her feet and boldly takes her home to meet his high class society minded mother.

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: A raven-haired enchantress, Cassie Nightingale, mysteriously moves into the local haunted mansion, 'Grey House', and seems to change her neighbors lives using a hint of magic causing many to think she’s a witch.

programme.title: After Life
programme.desc: After a horrific car accident, Anna (Christina Ricci) wakes up to find the funeral director (Liam Neeson) preparing her body for her funeral.

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: Radio astronomer Zane Zaminsky believes he has picked up a cosmic noise that signals extraterrestrial intelligence. His desperate search for answers leads him to discover that aliens are already on Earth and in the process of preparing to take it over.

programme.title: Beyond the Law
programme.desc: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Follows the key people at an investment bank over a 24-hour period during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: From director of action blockbuster Lethal Weapon, Richard Donner. Personal demons put cop Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard) at rock bottom but he wasn’t about to let a witness be murdered on his watch.

programme.title: Crystal Skulls
programme.desc: It is 2020 and the apocalypse is inevitable. 12 of 13 Crystal skulls are united causing catastrophic events. Only the 13th Skull can theoretically restore order before the Earth is destroyed from within by their power.

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.

programme.title: Freight
programme.desc: A Russian gang in the UK traffics Eastern Europeans and then enslaves them. The women forced into sex, the men into illegal fights. When they cross a local businessman, a war escalates.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it. Feat: Mel Gibson.

programme.title: Fist of Fury
programme.desc: A Bruce Lee Classic! Lee plays Chen Zhen, a student of Huo Yuanjia, who fights to defend the honor of the Chinese in the face of foreign aggression, and to bring to justice those responsible for his master's death.

programme.title: Cops and Robbers
programme.desc: A strung-out hostage negotiator plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse with a cornered bank robber who is hell-bent on getting out of the bank and humiliating the negotiator in the process.

programme.title: A Christmas Village
programme.desc: To save her reputation, Piper Jensen, a public relations genius and owner of her own PR company, agrees to work for the owner of a failing Santa’s Village and discovers love and how magical Christmas is after all.

programme.title: A Country Christmas Story
programme.desc: Musical icon and multiple Grammy Award winner Dolly Parton and Grammy Award nominated R&B singer and producer Brian McKnight star in this Lifetime Original Movie.

programme.title: The Flight Before Christmas
programme.desc: Starring Mayim Bialik and Ryan McPartlin. Two strangers offer to share the last remaining room at a bed-and-breakfast when a snowstorm strands their flight in Montana on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Under the Mistletoe
programme.desc: Starring Jaime Ray Newman, Michael Shanks, and Conan Graham. At Christmas, the tables turn on a selfless single mom when a local radio station takes over her love life after an innocent call from her 8-year-old son.
